column4: Does anybody know? I am using ext4 for my ubuntu system partition,  i report that i have used 38 GB of total 45GB, but there is only 8 GB on the disk, shown using disk usage analyzer, what can be the problem?
it's possible the other 30 GB is in a place your user doesn't have permission to read
please use gksudo if you're running a graphical program as root :)
